Title: Establishes a working group within the office of the state comptroller to study the process and ramifications of separating upstate and downstate New York into two separate states
Summary: Establishes a working group within the office of the state comptroller to study the process and ramifications of separating upstate and downstate New York into two separate states.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing a working group within the office of the state comptroller to study the process and ramifications of separating upstate and downstate New York into two separate states
